reviewText: Fantastic!  This is one of my favorite Korean drama.  I love all the characters especially Eugene.  I wish I can be like her, truly in love and have the determination to find him at all cost.
summary: Save the last dance for me
Title: Save the Last Dance for Me

reviewText: One of the original classic korean drama. I just love it. this is a must see.
Title: Save the Last Dance for Me

reviewText: Wonderful movie with lots of twists and turns with a happy ending.  I loved it.
summary: Save the Last Dance for Me
Title: Save the Last Dance for Me

reviewText: I love the music on the korean dramas and this one is no exception. Thank goodness for the music other wise alot of these drams would not be rated so high.The storyline was good but at the end it seemed as if the director did not know how to end the story and just throw everything in not giving closure to all of the characters.
Title: Save the Last Dance for Me

reviewText: this was a very good drama.  In fact it was the first Korean Drama that I watched which then got me to watch more.  It is great romance story so get out the tissue box.
summary: Save the Last Dance for Me
Title: Save the Last Dance for Me
